item.title: Video editor needed to re-create 80's TV intro - Upwork
item.description:
We are hoping to re-create the broadcast intro sequence for the Chicago Cubs on WGN-TV used in 1984.

We want the exact same animation with a few modifications:
- Whenever it says WGN-TV, we would want HTD-TV (the 9 does not have to stay)
- Instead of 1984 Chicago Cubs Baseball, we would want "2024 Hometown Cup Finals"
-Instead of the Cubs logo we would want the attached Cup logo
- We have a video that we can provide to replace the highlights/ads section

We would need no sound on this file, it would just be to recreate the animation and video portion. I'm not sure if it's possible to just edit the source file or if the animation would need to be re-done. We are not opposed to a "vintage" VHS quality to the final product.
